about_the_game:
Beneath the surface lies a world of endless depths, ancient ruins, and untold mysteries. Humanity has long since retreated underground, escaping the scorching stars above. In the shadows of towering underground cities and crumbling relics, survival is a daily struggle, and few dare to venture beyond the known boundaries. However, as one of the few Rogues it is your mission to scavenge the depths for valuables that are crucial to survival.

Test your skills in challenging combat where every encounter is a fight for survival. Discover powerful upgrades, master a variety of weapons, and adapt your strategy with each descent.

short_description: Roguefall is a action rogue-lite where a lone rogue sets off from a long forgotten ruin to scavenge the sprawling caverns below for artifacts. Fight, explore, collect, and fall until you reach the surface.
